   <style type="text/css">
    @keyframes heroslide_autoplay {
       
         0% {
           transform: translateX(0vw);
         }
         11.5% {
           transform: translateX(0vw);
         }
       
         13.5% {
           transform: translateX(-100vw);
         }
         36.5% {
           transform: translateX(-100vw);
         }
       
         38.5% {
           transform: translateX(-200vw);
         }
         61.5% {
           transform: translateX(-200vw);
         }
       
         63.5% {
           transform: translateX(-300vw);
         }
         86.5% {
           transform: translateX(-300vw);
         }
       
         88.5% {
           transform: translateX(-400vw);
         }
         100% {
           transform: translateX(-400vw);
         }
       
       }
 
       
       @keyframes heroslide_autoplay_ctrl1 {
         
         
         
         0% {
           border-color: #d2d2d2;
         }
         11.5% {
           border-color: #d2d2d2;
         }
         
         12% {
           border-color: white;
         }
         
       }
       
       @keyframes heroslide_autoplay_ctrl2 {
         
         
         
         12% {
           border-color: white;
         }
         
         13.5% {
           border-color: #d2d2d2;
         }
         36.5% {
           border-color: #d2d2d2;
         }
         
         37% {
           border-color: white;
         }
         
       }
       
       @keyframes heroslide_autoplay_ctrl3 {
         
         
         
         37% {
           border-color: white;
         }
         
         38.5% {
           border-color: #d2d2d2;
         }
         61.5% {
           border-color: #d2d2d2;
         }
         
         62% {
           border-color: white;
         }
         
       }
       
       @keyframes heroslide_autoplay_ctrl4 {
         
         
         
         62% {
           border-color: white;
         }
         
         63.5% {
           border-color: #d2d2d2;
         }
         86.5% {
           border-color: #d2d2d2;
         }
         
         87% {
           border-color: white;
         }
         
       }
       
       @keyframes heroslide_autoplay_ctrl5 {
         
         
         
         87% {
           border-color: white;
         }
         
         88.5% {
           border-color: #d2d2d2;
         }
         100% {
           border-color: #d2d2d2;
         }
         
       }
       
 
       
       .no-js input#hs1:checked ~ .slideshow .slide-container {
         transform: translateX(0vw);
       }
       .no-js input#hs_autoplay:checked ~ .controls > label[for=hs1] {
         animation: heroslide_autoplay_ctrl1 30s ease-in-out alternate infinite;
       }
       
       .no-js input#hs2:checked ~ .slideshow .slide-container {
         transform: translateX(-100vw);
       }
       .no-js input#hs_autoplay:checked ~ .controls > label[for=hs2] {
         animation: heroslide_autoplay_ctrl2 30s ease-in-out alternate infinite;
       }
       
       .no-js input#hs3:checked ~ .slideshow .slide-container {
         transform: translateX(-200vw);
       }
       .no-js input#hs_autoplay:checked ~ .controls > label[for=hs3] {
         animation: heroslide_autoplay_ctrl3 30s ease-in-out alternate infinite;
       }
       
       .no-js input#hs4:checked ~ .slideshow .slide-container {
         transform: translateX(-300vw);
       }
       .no-js input#hs_autoplay:checked ~ .controls > label[for=hs4] {
         animation: heroslide_autoplay_ctrl4 30s ease-in-out alternate infinite;
       }
       
       .no-js input#hs5:checked ~ .slideshow .slide-container {
         transform: translateX(-400vw);
       }
       .no-js input#hs_autoplay:checked ~ .controls > label[for=hs5] {
         animation: heroslide_autoplay_ctrl5 30s ease-in-out alternate infinite;
       }
       
 
       .no-js input#hs_autoplay:checked ~ .slideshow .slide-container {
         animation: heroslide_autoplay 30s ease-in-out alternate infinite;
       }
 
       
       .no-js input#hs1:checked ~ .controls > label[for=hs1],
       
       .no-js input#hs2:checked ~ .controls > label[for=hs2],
       
       .no-js input#hs3:checked ~ .controls > label[for=hs3],

    <script id="tmpl-search-suggestions.html" type="text/x-nunjuck">
     {% if terms %}
   <ul class="terms">
     {% for term in terms %}
       <li><a href="{{ url }}?{{ param }}={{ term.text }}">{{ term.highlighted }}</a></li>
     {% endfor %}
   </ul>
 {% endif %}
 
 {% if links %}
   <ul class="links">
     {% for link in links %}
       <li><a href="{{ link.url }}"{% if link.exit %} target="_blank"{% endif %}>
           {{ link.title }}
         </a></li>
     {% endfor %}
   </ul>
 {% endif %}
 
 {% if global_url %}
   <a class="global-search" href="{{ global_url }}">
     {% trans "global search link" %}
   </a>
 {% endif %}
